revision.text:
<!--언어_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Language
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사용 국가 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사용 지역 | ontologyProperty = region }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 인구 | ontologyProperty = populationTotal }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 계통 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통1 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통2 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통3 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통4 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통5 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통6 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통7 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통8 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통9 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통10 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통11 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통12 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통13 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통14 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 계통15 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = fam5 | ontologyProperty = languageFamily }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = iso1 | ontologyProperty = iso6391Code }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = iso2 | ontologyProperty = iso6392Code }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = iso3 | ontologyProperty = iso6393Code }}
end}}
